title: Neckera pennata
text:
Neckera pennata is a species of <a href="moss">moss</a> belonging to the family <a href="Neckeraceae">Neckeraceae</a>.
It has <a href="cosmopolitan%20distribution">cosmopolitan distribution</a>. Feather flat moss can be an indicator of late successional and old-growth hardwood forests, because it usually grows on sugar maples in the Northeast that are at least 120 years old.
